artLinks.title: Union Zine
artLinks.description: ðŸ”ž Very cool leather, latex, bondage, etc. zine by kinky friends of mine. Great display of varied art styles with a focus on "community" in kink.

artLinks.title: Kobold Zine
artLinks.description: kobold zine!! kobold zine!! kobold zine!!

artLinks.title: Devil Waltz
artLinks.description: Insanely cool webcomic by a good friend about rival Tieflings in a cool, scrappy fantasy world. Features characters originally created for some DnD games I DM'd but have grown so far beyond that.

artLinks.title: IA IA IA
artLinks.description: Webcomic about a duck!! There are also knights and dragons and cool other things! Very unique, fun art style and sense of humor. Worth your time 100% :3 Made by my very cool friend ${1}

webDev.title: HTML5up
webDev.description: Pure HTML and CSS HTML5 site templates. Cool and free. Good for projects and professional stuff, but I've just used them as tutorials/inspiration for solid web design fundamentals.

webDev.title: The Noun Project
webDev.description: Mostly-free repo of artists' icon art. Good source of icons or inspiration.

webDev.title: Ionicons
webDev.description: Free, tidy set of icons for apps.

webDev.title: "Clippy" CSS clip-path tool
webDev.description: Helpful tool for designing complex clip-path shapes with CSS

webDev.title: Open-source Windows 10 Activation Tool
webDev.description: Convenient script for activating copies of Windows 10 for free. Windows 11 sucks so, this is a good tool to have :3

miscLinks.title: Beautiful Audio
miscLinks.description: Passionate guy making amazing mods for Grado headphones. Had very positive email interactions with him, and his custom work have made my ${1} truly a pair of 'forever' headphones.

miscLinks.title: Unsplash
miscLinks.description: Incredible source of free-use, easily-attributable high-quality images. I use these all over my website with great gratitude
